name: PROTOWORLD ALPHA FEEDBACK DEMO v2.0
description:
PROTOWORLD WILL BE A GAME WHERE YOU EXPLORE AND EAT AND GROW AND CHANGE.
PROTOWORLD WILL BE A WORLD WHERE A STAR IS FALLING.
PROTOWORLD WILL BE A STORY ABOUT CREATURES THAT DON'T UNDERSTAND.

THIS IS THE SECOND PUBLIC DEMO OF PROTOWORLD. IT AIMS TO SHOWCASE THE PLAYER MOVEMENT AND ABILITIES AFTER THE FEEDBACK RECEIVED FROM V1.0. THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT AND IS FAR FROM COMPLETE.

THIS IS A 3D GAME - IT MAY BE SLOWER ON OLDER MACHINES YOU CAN USE A KEYBOARD, BUT A CONTROLLER IS EASIER (NOT ALL CONTROLLERS SUPPORTED) IF YOU ARE ON MAC, CTRL CLICK AND CHOOSE "OPEN" TO RUN
EMAIL FEEDBACK TO: FEEDBACK@PROTOWORLD.NET
WEBSITE: PROTOWORLD.NET
MY TWITTER: @PIXELATEDCROWN
